Text:

Just verifying that these DO work. For now.

Kaspersky has been screwing me over lately. I installed it before I got actual keys for it, and I just used the trial key for the first month, why not right?

Within a couple days, Kaspersky blocked it.

Anyways, I used these keys, it worked great. All three are for around the 79 day mark.

Glad to see you after long time sir Chattchitt.While you were away, Another dude named 'ThumperM' was mimicing your special window installation packages and bayimg pics. So I thought that was your new account.
